profile.rationale: The job title explicitly states "Back End Developer", indicating a primary focus on software engineering tasks (1.A.1. Software Development & Integration). The "AI Trainer" component is too vague to assign to a specific AI task category from the coding book, as it lacks details on the type of AI or the specific responsibilities. Therefore, the role is classified as AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, suggesting a software engineering role that integrates or supports AI functionalities.
